International Clinics on Infectious Disease Dynamics and Data

OUR MISSION

What we do

ICI3D trains junior researchers from the US and Africa to conduct integrative research in infectious disease dynamics and to communicate their questions, methods, and findings across disciplinary boundaries.

READ MORE

Reevaluating cumulative HIV-1 viral load as a prognostic predictor: predicting opportunistic infection incidence and mortality in a Ugandan cohort. [PDF]

Spatial heterogeneity in projected leprosy trends in India.

CE Brook et al. 2015 Parasites and Vectors

Effects of resource density on encounter rates and disease outcomes.

Mortality estimates from ovarian age distributions of the tsetse fly Glossina pallidipes Austen sampled in Zimbabwe suggest the need for new analytical approaches.
